comments.body:
The MIT licence requires a copy of the text to be included in all distributions of the package. Ideally it should be included in the tarball but as it's missing you can also include a copy in the recipe directory.
```suggestion
  license_family: MIT
  licence_file: LICENCE
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@  home: https://github.com/deppen8/pandas-vet
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A flake8 plugin to lint pandas in an opinionated way
